ai-analytics/ai-pipeline.title: AI Pipeline Deep Dive
ai-analytics/ai-pipeline.description: The AI Pipeline orchestrates the complete data processing flow in Game Insights. This document provides detailed documentation for each component.

ai-analytics/anomaly-detection.title: Anomaly Detection
ai-analytics/anomaly-detection.description: Automatically detect unusual patterns in your game metrics

ai-analytics/game-type-detection.title: Game Type Detection
ai-analytics/game-type-detection.description: Game Insights automatically classifies your game into one of five categories based on the data columns present. This enables game-specific metrics, visualizations, and recommendations.

ai-analytics/overview.title: AI & Analytics Overview
ai-analytics/overview.description: Game Insights leverages artificial intelligence and machine learning to automatically analyze your game data and provide actionable insights. This guide explains the AI capabilities and how they work together.

ai-analytics/predictions/churn.title: Churn Prediction
ai-analytics/predictions/churn.description: Identify users at risk of churning before they leave

ai-analytics/predictions/index.title: AI Predictions Overview
ai-analytics/predictions/index.description: Overview of predictive analytics capabilities in Game Insights

ai-analytics/predictions/ltv.title: LTV Prediction
ai-analytics/predictions/ltv.description: Estimate user lifetime value for smarter decisions

ai-analytics/predictions/retention.title: Retention Prediction
ai-analytics/predictions/retention.description: Predict D1, D7, D30 retention rates using AI models

ai-analytics/predictions/revenue.title: Revenue Forecasting
ai-analytics/predictions/revenue.description: Predict future revenue with confidence intervals

ai-analytics/recommendations.title: AI Recommendations
ai-analytics/recommendations.description: Get actionable AI-powered insights for your game

ai-analytics/schema-analysis.title: Schema Analysis
ai-analytics/schema-analysis.description: The Schema Analyzer automatically detects the semantic meaning of columns in your data. This enables Game Insights to understand what your data represents and provide relevant analysis.

api-reference/adapters.title: Data Adapters API
api-reference/adapters.description: Data adapters provide a unified interface for connecting to various data sources. All adapters extend the BaseAdapter abstract class and implement a consistent API for data retrieval.

api-reference/ai-pipeline.title: AI Pipeline API
api-reference/ai-pipeline.description: The AI Pipeline orchestrates data analysis through multiple stages: sampling, schema analysis, game detection, cleaning, metrics calculation, anomaly detection, cohort analysis, funnel detection, and insight generation.

api-reference/data-providers.title: Data Providers API
api-reference/data-providers.description: Data Providers implement a factory pattern to deliver game-type-specific data handlers. Each provider returns retention, funnel, revenue, and KPI data tailored to the game category.

api-reference/index.title: API Reference
api-reference/index.description: This section provides comprehensive documentation for developers who want to extend, customize, or integrate with Game Insights. All APIs are written in TypeScript and follow consistent patterns for ease of use.

api-reference/stores.title: Stores Reference
api-reference/stores.description: API reference for Zustand stores managing application state

cookbook/analyze-monetization.title: Analyze Monetization
cookbook/analyze-monetization.description: Understand your revenue, find opportunities, and grow your game's earnings

cookbook/connect-live-data.title: Connect Live Data
cookbook/connect-live-data.description: Set up real-time data sync in minutes

cookbook/custom-dashboard.title: Create a Custom Dashboard
cookbook/custom-dashboard.description: This tutorial guides you through building a personalized dashboard with drag-and-drop widgets, customized KPIs, and charts tailored to your needs.

cookbook/first-upload.title: Your First Data Upload
cookbook/first-upload.description: This tutorial walks you through uploading game analytics data to Game Insights, from preparing your file to viewing your first insights.

cookbook/index.title: Cookbook
cookbook/index.description: Welcome to the Game Insights Cookbook. These hands-on tutorials walk you through common tasks step-by-step, from uploading your first dataset to running A/B tests and analyzing monetization.

cookbook/run-ab-test.title: Run an A/B Test
cookbook/run-ab-test.description: Create, monitor, and analyze experiments without writing code

cookbook/setup-alerts.title: Setting Up Alerts
cookbook/setup-alerts.description: This tutorial shows you how to create alert rules that notify you when important metrics change, helping you catch issues early and identify opportunities.

dashboards/builder.title: Dashboard Builder
dashboards/builder.description: Create custom dashboards with drag-and-drop widgets using Game Insights' visual builder

dashboards/charts.title: Charts
dashboards/charts.description: Complete guide to chart configuration, the chart registry system, and ECharts integration in Game Insights

dashboards/exporting.title: Export Capabilities
dashboards/exporting.description: Export dashboards and data in multiple formats

dashboards/overview-dashboard.description: The main Game Insights dashboard with game-type aware KPIs, retention curves, funnels, and AI insights

dashboards/widgets.title: Widgets
dashboards/widgets.description: Complete reference for all dashboard widget types in Game Insights

features/alerts.description: Configure intelligent alerts for metrics monitoring and anomaly detection

features/funnels.title: Funnel Analysis
features/funnels.description: Analyze user conversion funnels with pre-built templates and detailed drop-off analysis

features/monetization.description: Track revenue, ARPU, ARPPU, spender tiers, and top-performing products

features/real-time.title: Real-time Monitoring
features/real-time.description: Live dashboard with 3-second updates for new users, active users, revenue, and SDK health

game-guides/idle.description: Analytics for idle, incremental, and clicker mobile games
